great fantasy short -> short : 1
fantasy short short -> by : 1
short short by -> isaac : 1

preservation by guy -> words : 1

guy words to -> range : 1
words to range -> over : 2

over the full -> scope : 1

criteria isaac asimov -> set : 1
isaac asimov set -> for : 1

for terry and -> martin : 1
and martin greenberg -> in : 1

in choosing the -> stories : 1
choosing the stories -> for : 1

is of the -> shortest : 1
of the shortest -> fantasy : 1

a compact triumph -> of : 1
